template.name: Template_UBNT_UniFi 02072015
template.description:
Template for UBNT UniFi system by sadman@sfi.komi.com Tested with controller v4.x, Zabbix v 2.4.
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/unifi_miner
Requirements: unifi_miner.pl v >= 0.9999 aptitude install libjson-xs-perl libwww-perl libio-socket-ssl-perl libdata-dumper-simple-perl libtime-hires-perl, a lot of beer

item_prototype.name: [{#NAME}] Number of all UAPs on site
[{#SITENAME}] Clients connected to UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description: Amount of clients (users+guests) connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] Clients connected to UAP "{#NAME}" (MAC)
item_prototype.description: Amount of clients (users+guests) connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] Guests connected to UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description: Number of guests (clients in guest networks) connected to UAP

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] Model of UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description: Model of UAP: BZ2 - UAP BZ2LR - UAP LR ...

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] RX drops on UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description:
rx_dropped; /* no space in linux buffers */
The number of packets dropped during reception.
The bottom line is that the high RX error rate is due to Radio interferences from neighboring Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Cordless phones, Cellular phones, Speakers, Microwave Ovens, Fans, and even Florescent lamps. If this is happening to your AP, you may want to tweak the Channel, Bluetooth coexistence mode, and dissociate the AP from any sources of interference.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] TX drops on UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description:
tx_dropped; /* no space available in linux */
The number of packets dropped during transmission.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] TX retries on UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description:
Number of times sending frame is retried without considering it a transmission failure.
Data rate is decreased upon failure and frame is sent again. Three sequential failures on lowest supported rate suspend transmission to this destination for the duration of on-fail-retry-time. After that, frame is sent again. The frame is being retransmitted until transmission success, or until client is disconnected after disconnect-timeout.

item_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] Users connected to UAP "{#NAME}"
item_prototype.description: Number of users connected to UAP

trigger_prototype.name: [{#SITENAME}] Firmware version on UAP "{#NAME}" is changed
[{#SITENAME}] Firmware version on UPH "{#NAME}" is changed
[{#SITENAME}] Firmware version on USW "{#NAME}" is changed
[{#SITENAME}] Security mode for WLAN "{#NAME}" is changed
[{#SITENAME}] WPA mode for WLAN "{#NAME}" is changed
